channel.title: Spawning NPC's On CHeezscape
channel.description:
ok...heres the deal that im in...im using cheezscape base server and i need to spawn 8 NPCs i have absolutly no idea how to do this as the server guide doesnt have a command that i saw.
i am wondering if someone could tell me how i could create my own NPCs and just experiment with them...id need a brief description of how and where and also...i need to know how to change the menus that come up when someone logs onto cheezscape (my version is Roidscape) i have asked this on another thread but no1 will answer.

item.title: Spawning NPC's On CHeezscape
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

ok i have tried the renaming i havnt check that yet btw i will in a sec…

about the cfg files…i need a program to open them and idk what to use…i will try notepad but i dont think it will work

EDIT: notepad works! lol nice guess by me!

ok i learned how to spawn npc’s just type ::npc then the code but now ive spawned them but they dont respond…like the make over mage will not respond it wont work

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning NPC's On CHeezscape
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

[quote=“RoidScape.Darkbb, post:1, topic:362295”]ok…heres the deal that im in…im using cheezscape base server and i need to spawn 8 NPCs i have absolutly no idea how to do this as the server guide doesnt have a command that i saw.

i am wondering if someone could tell me how i could create my own NPCs and just experiment with them…id need a brief description of how and where and also…i need to know how to change the menus that come up when someone logs onto cheezscape (my version is Roidscape) i have asked this on another thread but no1 will answer.[/quote]

autospawn.cfg in your cfg folder, now type this in

spawn = AAAAA   XXXX    YYYY    xxx2    yyy2    xxx3    yyy3    0    1

AAAA is the NPC ID
XXXX is the x coord
YYYY is the y coord
xxx2 is the second x coord - edit if you want your npc to move
yyy2 is the second x coord - edit if you want your npc to move
xxx3 is the second x coord - edit if you want your npc to move
yyy2 is the second x coord - edit if you want your npc to move

dont remember what the 0 and 1 mean so just leave them alone.
if you dont an npc to move just set all the xxx2 and stuffs to 0.

onto renaming, open up client.java and search for cheez and just replace all the cheezscape names and stuff to roidscape.

Read full topic
